pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, June 10, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Los Angeles, United States of America

Private meetings

9:00 a.m The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Second Plenary Session.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage of the Prime Minister’s intervention and host broadcast coverage

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Speaker of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Pelosi.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a presentation ceremony for the Los Angeles Declaration on Migration and Protection.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity and host broadcast coverage

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the official family photo of the Summit of the Americas.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Retreat and Working Luncheon hosted by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting and host broadcast coverage

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Third Plenary Session.

Note for media:

  • Host broadcast coverage

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Jamaica, Andrew Holness.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of the Dominican Republic, Luis Abinader.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

7:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
